title: Game crashing my computer
body:
Hey guys, about four days ago I was entering a draft pick and when the loading screen ended and the champs entered summoners rift my computer froze and I heard a loud buzzing sound. I wasn't able to CTRL ALT Delete out, so I turned off my computer. When I try again, same issue. I already uninstalled reinstalled, looked for updates, turned off cortana, virus scanned and didn't have any luck. I then read some posts about it having to do with either my ram, graphics card, or cpu. So i ran a stress test for CPU GPU and memory and I passed all three. I have no clue what I can do it fix this issue, please help! 

Intel(R) HD Graphics 5500

Report Date: Friday, August 26, 2016
Report Time [hh:mm:ss]: 12:04:32 AM
Driver Version: 20.19.15.4454
Operating System: Windows* 10 Home (10.0.14393)

Supported Modes
1366 x 768 (60p Hz)
1366 x 768 (48p Hz)

replies.body: A recent update to Windows 10 made a change to the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) bar that has been causing issues like this for some players.  Disabling it should get you fixed up.  Let me know!
